title.label: A great game from start - esthetics, game fluidity and physics are spot on.

content.label: Great game, installed it based on the great reviews and a recommendation from an online blog. Hate playing games where someone else with a credit card gets ahead. This levels the playing field and I believe is well worth the price. I‚Äôm always on the lookout for new apps, not big on racing games ... more strategy then anything. But it‚Äôs simple and complex enough that just about anyone would enjoy it. Graphics are refined but not overbearing or so intricate that they render odd or drain your device resources .... gameplay fluidity and physics feel great. I‚Äôm particular about that as I‚Äôm a fan of flight and simulator games. Decided to install today and found my self playing until my ‚Äúlow battery‚Äù notification made me realize how long I‚Äôd been on.  Im not a big gamer, but this truly is a classic arcade style game I want to keep around.

title.label: Best Wave Race game for iOS!!!

content.label: If you loved Wave Race for N64 then you‚Äôll love this game!!! You won‚Äôt regret it!!! Well worth $2.99!

What makes Riptide the best?
‚Äî NO F2P OR IN-APP PURCHASES! Yay!!! 
‚Äî Easy to pick up and play
‚Äî Controller support
‚Äî Great graphics
‚Äî Great physics
‚Äî Good upgrade system

I can‚Äôt stress enough how important it is to me that this game is NOT Free-to-Play. I understand how difficult it is to have a profitable and successful game on the App Store without resorting to a F2P model with in-app purchases, and I am glad Vector Unit has not done this with this game. Quality games on the App Store are severely lacking, especially games with controller support. Vector Unit, if you keep producing games like this, I will keep buying them. 
I wish these devs made an arcade car racer. I would be all over that!
To Apple: Please stop allowing in-app purchases for games! YES SERIOUSLY! It‚Äôs predatory and you‚Äôre part of the problem.
This is a great game. Easy to maneuver and great upgrades to make playing fun and rewarding.
This is like an arcade game it‚Äôs so cool
Lots of fun. Make you want a real thing.

Bar none this game gives u exactly what your looking for best graphics almost as good as PlayStation COMPLETE control extreme speed I can‚Äôt believe this game is on my iPad love it needs a part 2 already ‚úåüèøüëçüèøüëëüí®
Awesome Awesome

Great! we can each watch each other play one at a time. Fail.  Gorgeous game is useless nobody else can control. Excellent water physics, only one player.

Update:  while it is a menu option the developers don‚Äôt support split screen multiplayer on iOS. Lame when iPhone can function as a controller...

title.label: Fun for some, not all scenarios

content.label: Riptide is an amazingly stunning performance of how terrible i am at eye/hand coordination. The graphics are beautiful, and it flows with a force similar to a Japanese tsunami. This game crushes all other racing games. 3 situations i would not play this game, 1) while heavily intoxicated 2) while sitting on water bed 3) while riding your girlfriend. Other than that, this is one epic step away from reality. Oh and maybe not while driving either.

This game has the absolute worst handling. It almost impossible to not crash into walls. There is no option for touch screen steering just phone tilt. The graphics are cool that about it. This game misses the mark. I thought it would be more exciting too. Huge let down.
